title: New: EDDI FRONT – Superhero Style
body:
Having announced the release of her debut EP via Best Fit Records, Brooklyn songstress **Eddi Front** has unveiled yet another gem in what is proving to be an enviable catalogue of tracks.

Possibly her most **Lana Del Rey**\-esque moment so far, stumbling and caressing the singular word ‘black’ with a tender ferocity and classic sleaze, the French horn adds a Parisian vibe to _Superhero Style_. With yet another appearance on Pitchfork, as well as numerous buzzblogs and even some proper music blogs, **Eddi Front** is rapidly becoming a household name.
